ðŸ“– Summary: This Python-based Wireless IDS sniffs air traffic for suspicious activities like WEP/WPA/WPS attacks. It detects various attack types, including deauthentication floods, rogue access points, and specific attack packets from tools like Aircrack-NG and MDK3. The system offers logging and customizable settings for enhanced monitoring.
